code: @Test public void testAssertIsTrueInvalid() {     try {         AssertUtils.isTrue(false, "message").         Assert.fail("Should have thrown exception").     } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {         Assert.assertEquals("[Assert is true] message", e.getMessage()).     } }
@Test public void testAssertNoNullValid() {     AssertUtils.notNull(new Object(), " message"). }

@Test public void testAssertNotNullInvalid() {     try {         AssertUtils.notNull(null, "message").         Assert.fail("Should have thrown exception").     } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {         Assert.assertEquals("[Assert not null] message", e.getMessage()).     } }
